body: /* @font-face {	font-family: "Whitney";	font-style: normal;	font-weight: normal;	src: url(../fonts/Whitney-Book.woff2) format("woff2");} */$$typo1: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;$$breakpoints: (	mobile: 375px,	tablet: 768px,	laptop: 1280px,	desktop: 1920px,);@mixin mobile-only {	@media screen and (max-width: map-get($breakpoints, mobile)) {		@content;	}}@mixin tablet {	@media screen and (max-width: map-get($breakpoints, tablet)) {		@content;	}}@mixin laptop {	@media screen and (max-width: map-get($breakpoints, laptop)) {		@content;	}}@mixin desktop {	@media screen and (max-width: map-get($breakpoints, desktop)) {		@content;	}}*, ::before, ::after {	margin: 0;	padding: 0;	box-sizing: border-box;}html {	font-size: 62.5%;}body {	min-height: 100vh;	font-family: $$typo1;	font-size: 1.8rem;}input, button, textarea, select {	font: inherit;}
